name: The Last Thanksgiving
description:
Many Thanksgivings have gone by in the past few years, but it just hasn't been the same. Not since the turkey went extinct. But wait! A live turkey spotted in the nearby woods! Play as the lively turkey trying to defend themselves from the hungry crazed hunters. The only things the hunters don't know is that you are ARMED AND DANGEROUS!

Game designed and created by Kassandra Ponder, Andrea Trevino,

& Rudy Vasquez (TalkingTaco).
